content: **knitted jacket in 1 strand drops flora and 1 strand drops kid-silk piece is knitted top down in stocking stitch with european yoke and edges i english rib size xs xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #silverdriftcardigan drops design pattern fl-101 yarn group a + a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** xs - s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops flora from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 300-300-350-350-400-450-450 g colour 03 light grey and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 150-150-175-175-200-225-225 g colour 44 moonlight **buttons** drops button no 629 6-6-7-7-7-7-8 pieces **needles** drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 and 80 cm drops circular needle size 2 5 mm length 40 and 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 4 mm drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 19 stitches in width and 25 row vertically in stocking stitch on needle size 4 mm with 1 strand of each quality = 10 x 10 cm note remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles
